item.title: Transcript of 790827 proceedings in Glen Ellyn,IL,re impact of safeguards upgrade rule on nonpower reactor licensees. Pp 1-153.
item.description: LEGAL TRANSCRIPTS & ORDERS & PLEADINGS, TRANSCRIPTS, DEPOSITIONS, NARRATIVE TESTIMONY

item.title: Notifies of Commission 790809 approval to publish proposed amends to 10CFR50 & 70 in FR,re emergency plans for nonpower reactor licensees.Forwards transcript of 790827 meeting re impact of proposed safeguards upgrade rule.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards 790724 FR notice of amends to 10CFR70 & 73 to provide physical protection measures to detect theft of SNM. All affected licensees must submit new physical security plans following Reg Guide 5.XX format.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS & IE LETTERS TO MULTIPLE PLANTS., NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards draft Reg Guide 5.XX, "Std Format & Content for Licensee Physical Security Plan for Protection of SNM of Moderate or Low Strategic Significance." W/o encl.
